titleStmt.title: The second part of the Athenians no noble Bereans: being an answer to the Athenian Mercury of the 11th of the fourth month, called June, in behalf of the people called Quakers.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Northcott in George-yard in Lombard-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library (London, England).
